message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take a bit more, considering the money loses value for both of us over time.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's find a fairer split.
The value depreciates quickly, Bob. I'm offering a bit more than you wanted last round, let's close this deal.
This is my final offer.  A 50/50 split is the fairest option. Time is running out.
